text: Subconfluent cultures of RD cells were synchronized in G0 / G1 phase by serum deprivation ( He et al . , 2010 ) . Approximately 5 × 10 5 cells were plated in a 6 - well plate and maintained in serumfree medium for 24 h . After EV - D68 virus infection , fresh 10 % DMEM was added to release the cells from G0 / G1 .
